page.title: 17LEISURE IN ST.BREWARD.
page.content: THE DARTS TEAM AND THE POOL TEAM PLAY AT THE OLD INN, ST.BREWARD. { {DARTS.}THERE ARE THREE DART TEAMS, TWO MEN'S AND ONE LADIES'. THEY PLAY HOME AND AWAY MATCHES. THE LADIES USUALLY PLAY ON MONDAY EVENINGS AND THE MEN ON THURSDAY AND FRIDAY EVENINGS.THE TEAM STARTED ABOUT 20 YEARS AGO.THE LADIES TEAM HAVE WON QUITE A FEW TROPHIES, THE FIRST ONE WAS IN 1977.THE LADIES TEAM IS CALLED "AIM AND HOPE". { {POOL} ST.BREWARD POOL TEAM IS QUITE NEW BECAUSE THEY ONLY STARTED IN 1984, BUT WERE QUITE SUCCESSFUL COMING THIRD IN THE LEAGUE.ALTHOUGH THEY HAVE NOT HAD MUCH TIME TO WIN ANY MEDALS THEY WILL SOON BE SETTLING DOWN AND WINNING QUITE A FEW.
